name: ADIDAS Blue Resp Trail 18 M Sports Shoe
description:
Take running to the next level with these Resp Trail 18M shoes from adidas. The sleek design with the sturdy structure and high performance features helps you run better for longer. Team these with jeans and tees for a cool casual look.

Upper
Air mesh uppers with synthetic overlays for excellent ventillation
adidas patented 3-Stripe design on the sides for enhanced support and to exude the brand’s belief in performance
Lace-ups for snug Fit
Mesh tongue for greater breathability
Cushioned collar for greater comfort
Brand name embossed on the tongue and on the heel

Midsole
Removable footbed that can be replaced with a medical orthotic
adiPRENE® in the forefoot maintains propulsion and efficiency

Outsole
FORMOTION technology on the outsole adapts to the ground to ensure the smoothest, most comfortable run possible
adiPRENE® gives superior cushioning on impact
adiWEAR® outsole with aggressive mult-directional lugs with small spikes on the forefoot and heel offers better grip on trails and  durability
TORSION® provides midfoot support
Flex grooves provide greater flexibility to the feet

shoe care
Wipe surface with damp, clean cloth to remove dirt
Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight

Ball care

Moisten the inflation needle before inserting it into the valve, preferably with silicone oil or glycerine

name: ADIDAS Unisex Strap Watches
description:
Functionality meets fashion with this Candy digital watch from adidas. Forever white, and packed with features, this watch is a must have for those who never compromise on style and comfort.

Case diameter: 40 mm
Case thickness: 10 mm
Dial shape: Rectangle

Plastic case with a plastic strap for enhanced durability and comfort
Tang clasp to keep the watch firm in place as a belt buckle
Fixed resin bezel for added durability
Digital chronograph system where time is counted and accumulated in various formats independent of the main time, like displaying date, month, seconds, alarm, a stop watch, etc.
Quartz movement of time display to ensure accurate time measurement
Backlight to view time in low light conditions
Scratch resistant mineral crystal to keep your watch safe and well protected for years
Solid case back for enhanced life
Water resistant at 50 meters allowing you to use it when swimming and showering

name: Reebok Men Manza II Brown Sandals
description:

Brand name on front and back

Outsole

name: Reebok Men Walk Max PU Black Sports Shoes
description:
reebok men's Walk Max PU is a customized running shoes for your feet. DMX Max is a hollow two-pod cushioning system made for the walker seeking the maximum amount of DMX cushioning. Air trapped inside DMX Max travels back and forth under the foot in concert with each walker’s individual stride. This moving cushion of air delivers sensational cushioning and comfort.

Upper
Mesh upper with synthetic overlays for enhanced breathability
Lace-ups for a snug Fit
Cushioned collar, tongue and footbed for extra comfort
Mesh tongue for greater breathability
Breathable mesh lining and a removable insert

Midsole
EVA midsole for cushioned support and shock absorption

Outsole
Forefoot flex-grooves provide flexibility through footstrike and toe-off
Multi-surface rubber outsole for traction and durability

shoe care
Wipe surface with soft, clean, damp cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash
